name: Ymdir
description:
Ymdir is a roguelike card game developed by Mad Burger Studios.

Take on the role of the chosen of your tribe and hike the sacred mountain in the hope of stopping the blight that has infected your land.

Planned Features:

  • Card based, turn based battles.
  • Rogue like gameplay, you are going to die.
  • Choose your path to travel along the map.
  • Events to spice up your adventure.
  • We wrote some lore too!
  • Nordic theme!
  • Crystals!

Future Features:

  • New classes on the ride with different cards to play.
  • More inclusivity (we'll add some women but everyone in the team is sexist, just joking, they have my family hostage).
  • A support discord server to dox our team.
  • More areas to travel trough.
  • I'll get high and write more lore.

Game currently in development by Mad Burger Studios.

We are close to the alpha, please send help, they have my dog too.
